bancoInst[0] = 32'b011011_00000_11101_0000000001100011;		//LOADI	29,99
bancoInst[1] = 32'b011011_00000_11110_0000000001100100;		//LOADI	30,100
bancoInst[2] = 32'b011011_00000_11111_0000000000001101;		//LOADI	31,_Fim
bancoInst[3] = 32'b010100_00000000000000000000000100;		//J	main
bancoInst[4] = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;		//LABEL	main
bancoInst[5] = 32'b011011_00000_00001_0000000000000001;		//LOADI	1,1
bancoInst[6] = 32'b100000_00000_00001_0000000000000000;		//OUT	0,1
bancoInst[7] = 32'b011011_00000_00001_0000000000000010;		//LOADI	1,2
bancoInst[8] = 32'b100000_00000_00001_0000000000000001;		//OUT	1,1
bancoInst[9] = 32'b011011_00000_00001_0000000000000011;		//LOADI	1,3
bancoInst[10] = 32'b100000_00000_00001_0000000000000010;		//OUT	2,1
bancoInst[11] = 32'b011010_11110_00001_0000000000000000;		//STORE	1,0,30
bancoInst[12] = 32'b010011_11111_00000_00000_00000000000;		//JR	31
bancoInst[13] = 32'b00000000000000000000000000000000;		//LABEL	_Fim
bancoInst[14] = 32'b111111_00000000000000000000000000;		//HALT
